Package index

All functions

abronia
Occurrence records of Abronia graminea
bg_by_date()
Function to obtain environmental background by dates
cells2samp()
Helper function to generate cell IDs to be used for choosing the environmental background data
clean_dup()
Function to clean duplicated longitude and latitude data
clean_dup_by_date()
Function to clean duplicated coordinates data
colors
Colors for plotting
correlation_finder()
Function to find out strong correlations in a correlation matrix
cov_center()
Function to compute the Minimum Volume covariance Matrix of an ellipsoid niche model.
ellipsoid_omr()
ellipsoid_omr
ellipsoid_projection()
ellipsoid_projection: function to fit an ellipsoid model
ellipsoid_selection()
ellipsoid_selection: Performs variable selection for ellipsoid models
ex_by_date()
Extract environmental data by date
inEllipsoid()
inEllipsoid: Determine if a point is inside or outside an ellipsoid
metaras()
Helper function to obtain layer name from a raster layer
pROC()
Partial ROC calculation for Niche Models
plot_ellipsoid()
Function to plot ellipsoid models in E-space
predict(<sp.temporal.selection>)
Predict potential distribution for tenm regarding to a specific time period of environmental conditions or averages.
sp.temporal.bg-class
S3 classes to organize data and results of tenmp objects
sp.temporal.env-class
S3 classes to organize data and results of tenmp objects
sp.temporal.modeling-class
S3 classes to organize data and results of tenmp objects
sp.temporal.selection-class
S3 classes to organize data and results of tenmp objects
sp_temporal_data()
Function to create a Species Temporal Data object (STD object).
tdf2swd()
Temporal data.frame to Samples With Data format
tenm_selection()
Function to find the best n-dimensional ellipsoid model using Partial Roc as a performance criteria.

Developed by Luis Osorio-Olvera, Miguel Hernández, Rusby G. Contreras-Díaz, Xavier Chiappa-Carrara, Fernanda Rosales-Ramos, Mariana Munguía-Carrara, Oliver López-Corona.
